sentences.sContent: The thing that you touch is too much also, return amerce!
sentences.sContent_eng: The thing that you touch is too much also, return amerce!
sentences.sCn: 你碰的事情也太多了吧，还罚款呢！

sentences.sContent: It is to be not formed so detain, be about to apply for to fill without business license plate do, amerce!
sentences.sContent_eng: It is to be not formed so detain, be about to apply for to fill without business license plate do, amerce!
sentences.sCn: 这样是不构成拘留的，没有营业牌照就要申请补办， 罚款！

sentences.sContent: If reject to apply for to fill, do, will close down and amerce, if reject amerce to perhaps can be detained!
sentences.sContent_eng: If reject to apply for to fill, do, will close down and amerce, if reject amerce to perhaps can be detained!
sentences.sCn: 假如拒绝申请补办，将会查封以及罚款，假如拒绝罚款也许会被拘留！
